mapper.select: SELECT * FROM defect_list WHERE is_deleted = 0 and company_id = #{company_id}
SELECT * FROM defect_list WHERE (defect_type LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR defect_code LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%") AND is_deleted=0 and company_id = #{company_id}
SELECT * FROM defect_list WHERE classification = #{keyword} AND is_deleted=0 and company_id = #{company_id}
SELECT defect_type,defect_code FROM defect_list WHERE is_deleted=0 and company_id = #{company_id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE defect_list set is_deleted=1 WHERE defect_code = #{defectCode} and company_id = #{company_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO defect_list(defect_type,defect_code,classification,status,is_deleted, created_time,created_by,modified_time,modified_by,company_id) VALUES (#{defectType},#{defectCode},#{classification},#{status},#{isDeleted}, #{createdTime},#{createdBy},#{modifiedTime},#{modifiedBy},#{company_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE defect_type=#{defectType},classification=#{classification}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime},modified_by=#{modifiedBy},company_id=#{company_id}
